trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Glassboro
There were no other sightings in Glassboro on or around November 28th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsOutside on deck smoking cigar. Looking east I see a red-orange object flying in a straight line level with ground at a low attitute at about 75-80 degrees above the horizon. Moving very fast, to the west, I saw it maybe for 1-2 seconds before it disappeared behind neighbors house. The object looked like a fire log with no flames, just glowing red hot. Thought it was a meteor at first, but just didn't look like one after I thought about it.
Summary: Racing across the sky, fastest thing I ever seen. Red-orange object.
